==== Examples ====
===== Polygons =====
<source>
{{ #widget : RadarChart
  | query = '
    SELECT ?org (COUNT(?project) AS ?countProjects) WHERE { 
      ?org rdf:type <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization> .
      ?org rdfs:label ?label .
      ?org <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/project> ?project
    FILTER regex(?label, "^Th.*Ltd$") }
    GROUP BY ?org'
  | input = 'org'
  | output = {{ 'countProjects' }}
  | gridType = 'polygons'
  | bullet = 'bubble'
  | bulletSize = '12'
  | colors = {{ '#FF5CB8' }}
}}
</source>

<img src="../images/help/RadarChart/Polygons.PNG" width="800px" />

===== Circles =====
Same configuration as above but with "gridType = 'circles'".

<img src="../images/help/RadarChart/Circles.PNG" width="800px" />

===== Clustered =====
The Radar Chart widget can handle multiple output dimensions.

<source>
{{ #widget : RadarChart
  | query = '
      SELECT ?org (COUNT(?project)+20 AS ?countProjects) (COUNT(?o) AS ?outgoingLinks) WHERE { 
        ?org rdf:type <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization> .
        ?org rdfs:label ?label .
        FILTER regex(?label, "^T.*Ltd$")
        {
          ?org <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/project> ?project
        }
        UNION
        {
          ?org ?p ?o
        }
      }
      GROUP BY ?org HAVING (?outgoingLinks < 100)'
  | input = 'org'
  | output = {{ 'countProjects' | 'outgoingLinks' }}
  | gridType = 'polygons'
  | bullet = 'round'
  | colors = {{ '#71BA6B' | '#C10F3F' }}
}}
</source>

<img src="../images/help/RadarChart/Clustered.PNG" width="800px" />
